e="preserve">Timothy Jackson Drake is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. He is a sidekick of superhero Batman. He was created by Marv Wolfman and Pat Broderick.
He first appeared in 436 (August 1989) as the third character to assume the role of Batman's sidekick Robin.
The character has been seen in "The New Batman Adventures", ', and the video game series '. In 2011, Tim Drake was ranked 32nd in IGN's Top 100 Comic Book Heroes.
